text: The Mexican Railroad GR-3 Class 2-8-0 is a class of 5 American built Mexican 2-8-0 type steam locomotives built in 1910,1936 by Baldwin and ALCO for the National Railways of Mexico aka the Mexican Railroad in Mexico . These locomotives were numbered 900-906 . They were retired in 1962 . One Locomotive #903 is on display while the others were retired and ether preserved or scrapped.
title: Mexican Railroad GR-3 Class 2-8-0
